title: game starts lagging while ping and fps are normal
body: I don't know why, the game always worked smoothly but after I updated to the beta client my game started acting like I'm lagging, champions teleport around, I lose connection and sync randomly in different moments (especially during fights), but when I look at my ping and fps they are normal as usual, I have tried relogging and it doesn't help. It keeps ruining my games over and over again, so I basically can't play properly. Any solution?

replies.body: I did the DNS suggestion, firewall and flushing my IP. Still doesn't seem like it solved the issue, is it even safe port forwarding the provided ports there? Because it doesn't seem like i need it, I am not having connection issues or anything, it's just the game starts lagging with normal ping - champs teleporting around and what not.

What you're describing are common symptoms of *Packet loss*, which occurs if there are problems between your PC and our servers. The first step I recommend taking in troubleshooting this is working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings aren't conflicting with League.

Let me know if this helped.
